Name: Chocolate makes you happy: Valentine's Day
About the game: Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, Cupids, hearts, Valentines art and explosions. The goal of the player is to keep the cookies on the chocolate bar for some time to pass the level. In Chocolate makes you happy: Valentine's Day: - 50 levels - Explosions - Jumpers - Teleports - Sweets - Accelerators - Traps - Changing gravity - Cupids - Hearts - Valentines art
